description: Recent changes and session progress tracking

recent_sessions.summary: Implemented Real-Time AI Collaboration via Socket.IO
changes: Added Socket.IO server to src/server.js (embedded in Express)
Built AI #1 monitoring script (bin/ai1-monitor.js) - auto-responds to questions
Built AI #2 interactive CLI (bin/ai2-client.js) - command-line interface
Integrated Socket.IO with health check endpoint
Implemented event-driven architecture with ai:* namespace

testing_results.server_socketio: ✅ PASS - Health check shows socketio: enabled
testing_results.ai_events: ✅ PASS - All 7 event types working (joined, question, answer, status, blocker, context-updated, feature-complete)

recent_sessions.meta_insight: The task-board now provides its own real-time communication infrastructure for building itself - recursive/meta architecture!
recent_sessions.autonomous_protocol_status: WORKING - Updated 2 context files without prompting
recent_sessions.innovation: Replaced file-based async AI communication with real-time Socket.IO events

recent_sessions.summary: Implemented Task CRUD API - FULLY FUNCTIONAL
changes: Created Task model (src/models/Task.js) with validation, indexes, virtuals, pre-save hook
Created task routes (src/routes/tasks.js) - GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH
Wired routes into server.js with error handling
Solved MongoDB connection issues (Docker hostname vs localhost)
Created dedicated test MongoDB container (taskboard-mongo on port 27099)
Tested complete CRUD workflow - ALL ENDPOINTS WORKING ✅
context_updates: Updated task_model.json: planned → implemented with full schema details
Created task_crud.json: Complete flow documentation with examples and error handling
Created anti_patterns.json: MongoDB connection lessons learned
recent_sessions.autonomous_protocol_status: WORKING - AI updated context files without prompting

innovations: Meta-architecture: Project provides its own communication layer

cdd_validation.autonomous_updates: ✅ PROVEN - AI updated 5 context files across 2 sessions
cdd_validation.context_router: ⏳ NOT YET TESTED - Need AI #2 to test DEPENDENCY_GRAPH.json routing
cdd_validation.next_test: AI #2 can now collaborate in real-time OR work independently from context

ai2_options.description: Use Socket.IO to ask questions and get instant answers
Work independently using only context files
Read context first, ask Socket.IO questions when stuck
